name: abramcatalyst/laravel-flutterwave
description: A comprehensive Flutterwave payment gateway package for Laravel 9.x, 10.x, 11.x, 12.x and above

suggest.illuminate/database: Required if you want to use the FlutterwaveTransaction model or migrations (^9.0|^10.0|^11.0|^12.0)

post-install-cmd: @php -r "if (file_exists('vendor/laravel/framework/src/Illuminate/Foundation/Console/Kernel.php')) { echo 'Run: php artisan flutterwave:health-check to verify installation\n'; }"
post-update-cmd: @php -r "if (file_exists('vendor/laravel/framework/src/Illuminate/Foundation/Console/Kernel.php')) { echo 'Run: php artisan flutterwave:health-check to verify installation\n'; }"
test: @php -r "echo 'Run: php artisan flutterwave:health-check to verify installation\n';"
